adventures map

	
	
objectives

	
		from mediphy.mixes.adventures_map import adventures_map
		adventures = adventures_map ({
			"adventures": [
				{
					"name": "adventure_1",
					
					"turn on": {
						"adventure": "python3 -m http.server 8080",
						"kind": "process identity"
					}
				},
				{
					"name": "adventure_2",
					
					"turn on": {
						"adventure": "sanic harbor:create --port=8090 --host=0.0.0.0 --factory",
						"kind": "custom"
					},
					"turn off": "sanic inspect shutdown --port=8090",
					"is on":
				}
			]
		])
	
		adventures ["turn on"] ()
			
			# turns the proceses on if they are not on.
			# checks "is on" on cycle for 5 seconds
			
			adventures_map.JSON {
				"adventure_1": {
					"process_identity": ""
				},
				"adventure_2": {
					"process_identity": ""
				}				
			}
		
		
		adventures ["turn off"] ()
	
	
	
		adventures ["is on"] ()
